EARS.description: Enable Asynchronous Request in Stop Register

TCD%s_NBYTES_MLNO.description: TCD Minor Byte Count (Minor Loop Mapping Disabled)

TCD%s_NBYTES_MLOFFNO.description: TCD Signed Minor Loop Offset (Minor Loop Mapping Enabled and Offset Disabled)

TCD%s_NBYTES_MLOFFYES.description: TCD Signed Minor Loop Offset (Minor Loop Mapping and Offset Enabled)

TCD%s_CITER_ELINKNO.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

TCD%s_CITER_ELINKYES.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

TCD%s_DLASTSGA.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

TCD%s_BITER_ELINKNO.description: TCD Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

TCD%s_BITER_ELINKYES.description: TCD Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

ERRCHN.description: Error Channel Number or Canceled Channel Number

VLD.description: Logical OR of all ERR status bits

SAST.description: Set All START Bits (activates all channels)

EDREQ_0.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 0.

EDREQ_1.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 1.

EDREQ_2.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 2.

EDREQ_3.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 3.

EDREQ_4.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 4

EDREQ_5.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 5

EDREQ_6.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 6

EDREQ_7.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 7

MLOFF.description: If SMLOE or DMLOE is set, this field represents a sign-extended offset applied to the source or destination address to form the next-state value after the minor loop completes.

ELINK.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete
Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

DLASTSGA.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather)

INTMAJOR.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes.

INTHALF.description: Enable an interrupt when major counter is half complete.

MAJORELINK.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on major loop complete

ELINK.description: Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete
Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete

MGSTAT0.description: Memory Controller Command Completion Status Flag

EEERDY.description: This flag indicates if the EEPROM backup data has been copied to the FlexRAM and is therefore available for read access

CCOBn.description: The FCCOB register provides a command code and relevant parameters to the memory controller

DFDIF.description: Double Bit Fault Detect Interrupt Flag

DFDIE.description: Double Bit Fault Detect Interrupt Enable

CLP3.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP2.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP1.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP0.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLPX.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP9.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP3_OFS.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP2_OFS.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP1_OFS.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP0_OFS.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLPX_OFS.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLP9_OFS.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

DATAL.description: DATAL stores the lower 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC

DATALL.description: CRCLL stores the first 8 bits of the 32 bit DATA

DATALU.description: DATALL stores the second 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

DATAH.description: DATAH stores the high 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC

DATAHL.description: DATAHL stores the third 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

DATAHU.description: DATAHU stores the fourth 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

GPOLYL.description: POLYL stores the lower 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC polynomial value

GPOLYLL.description: POLYLL stores the first 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

GPOLYLU.description: POLYLL stores the second 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

GPOLYH.description: POLYH stores the high 16 bits of the 16/32 bit CRC polynomial value

GPOLYHL.description: POLYHL stores the third 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

GPOLYHU.description: POLYHU stores the fourth 8 bits of the 32 bit CRC

WAS.description: Write CRC Data Register As Seed

FXOR.description: Complement Read Of CRC Data Register

BB.description: PDB Channel Pre-Trigger Back-to-Back Operation Enable

ICRST.description: FTM counter reset by the selected input capture event.

INIT.description: Initial Value Of The FTM Counter

REINIT.description: FTM Counter Reinitialization By Synchronization (FTM counter synchronization)

DECAPEN0.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable For n = 0

DECAP0.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures For n = 0

DECAPEN1.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable For n = 2

DECAP1.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures For n = 2

DECAPEN2.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable For n = 4

DECAP2.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures For n = 4

DECAPEN3.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Enable For n = 6

DECAP3.description: Dual Edge Capture Mode Captures For n = 6

TOFDIR.description: Timer Overflow Direction In Quadrature Decoder Mode

QUADIR.description: FTM Counter Direction In Quadrature Decoder Mode

SWRSTCNT.description: FTM counter synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

SWWRBUF.description: MOD, HCR, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

SWOM.description: Output mask synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

SWINVC.description: Inverting control synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

SWSOC.description: Software output control synchronization is activated by the software trigger.

HWRSTCNT.description: FTM counter synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

HWWRBUF.description: MOD, HCR, CNTIN, and CV registers synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

HWOM.description: Output mask synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

HWINVC.description: Inverting control synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

HWSOC.description: Software output control synchronization is activated by a hardware trigger.

FTM0_OUTSEL.description: FTM0 channel modulation select with FTM1_CH1

CMD32EN.description: Enables or disables WDOG support for 32-bit (or 16-bit or 8-bit) refresh/unlock command write words

CNTLOW.description: Low byte of the Watchdog Counter

CNTHIGH.description: High byte of the Watchdog Counter

TOVALLOW.description: Low byte of the timeout value

TOVALHIGH.description: High byte of the timeout value

CS.description: Pulse Width Timer Control and Status Register

PPH.description: Pulse Width Timer Positive Pulse Width Register: High

PPL.description: Pulse Width Timer Positive Pulse Width Register: Loq

NPH.description: Pulse Width Timer Negative Pulse Width Register: High

NPL.description: Pulse Width Timer Negative Pulse Width Register: Low

CNTH.description: Pulse Width Timer Counter Register: High

CNTL.description: Pulse Width Timer Counter Register: Low

FCTLE.description: First counter load enable after enable

PRDYIE.description: PWT Pulse Width Data Ready Interrupt Enable

TGL.description: PWTIN states Toggled from last state

SHIFTBUFBIS%s.description: Shifter Buffer N Bit Swapped Register

SHIFTBUFBYS%s.description: Shifter Buffer N Byte Swapped Register

SHIFTBUFBBS%s.description: Shifter Buffer N Bit Byte Swapped Register

ROSCEREFS.description: RTC 32k Oscillator external reference clcok selection

SERVICE.description: The EWM refresh mechanism requires the CPU to write two values to the SERV register: a first data byte of 0xB4, followed by a second data byte of 0x2C

COMPAREL.description: To prevent runaway code from changing this field, software should write to this field after a CPU reset even if the (default) minimum refresh time is required

COMPAREH.description: To prevent runaway code from changing this field, software should write to this field after a CPU reset even if the (default) maximum refresh time is required

CLK_DIV.description: Selected low power clock source for running the EWM counter can be prescaled as below

LPFLLCSR.description: Low Power FLL Control Status Register

LPFLLTCFG.description: Low Power FLL Trim Configuration Register

SOSCCMRE.description: System OSC Clock Monitor Reset Enable

ROSCCMRE.description: RTC OSC Clock Monitor Reset Enable

IGNACK.description: When set, the received NACK field is ignored and assumed to be ACK

RXEDGIE.description: RX Input Active Edge Interrupt Enable

RXEDGIF.description: RXD Pin Active Edge Interrupt Flag

TXDIR.description: TXD Pin Direction in Single-Wire Mode

HYSTCTR.description: Comparator hard block hysteresis control. See chip data sheet to get the actual hystersis value with each level

OFFSET.description: Comparator hard block offset control. See chip data sheet to get the actual offset value with each level

INNSEL.description: Selection of the input to the negative port of the comparator

INPSEL.description: Selection of the input to the positive port of the comparator

ACOn.description: The result of the input comparison for channel n

INITMOD.description: Comparator and DAC initialization delay modulus.

LVDSC1.description: Low Voltage Detect Status and Control 1 Register

LVDSC2.description: Low Voltage Detect Status and Control 2 Register

REGFPM.description: Regulator in Full Performance Mode Status Bit

EWAKEUP.description: Existence of SRS[WAKEUP] status indication feature

ELVD.description: Existence of SRS[LVD] status indication feature

ELOL.description: Existence of SRS[LOL] status indication feature

EPIN.description: Existence of SRS[PIN] status indication feature

ECORE1.description: Existence of SRS[CORE1] status indication feature

LVD.description: Low-Voltage Detect Reset or High-Voltage Detect Reset

RSTFLTSRW.description: Reset Pin Filter Select in Run and Wait Modes

RSTFLTSS.description: Reset Pin Filter Select in Stop Mode

RSTFLTSEL.description: Reset Pin Filter Bus Clock Select

ASC.description: Each bit in the ASC field indicates whether there is a corresponding connection to the crossbar switch's slave input port.

AMC.description: Each bit in the AMC field indicates whether there is a corresponding connection to the AXBS master input port.
